1.0.1.name: wordpress/content-by-location
1.0.1.description:
This plugin in his early stages (but stil stable), please let me know if you having any bug.

to show content by country just use the shortcode like this:

[cbl country="country code"] 
your content 
[/cbl]

the country code can found here: SO_3166-1_alpha-2

the api's (web services) you can choose from (under settings):

  • smart-ip.net
  • hostip.info
  • maxmind.com

please notice: the maxmind database is local and from time to time check out this page for new updates:geolitecountry. the geoip.dat need to be extrect to plugin path :content-by-location/geoip.

for any qustion you can contact me here: http://wpdevplus.com/contact/

Thanks!

I would like to thank my wife for sleeping alone while i wrote this plugin (thanks s
